body: It might be a better idea to put the expand-producing logic into `fuse` rather than trying to make a distinction in `isFusible`. Really the first part here is just trying to establish whether we can make a mutation, and the `fuse` has traditionally done the mutate part. It would be better to keep it that way and teach `fuse` how to generate expands.
